title: ‘A Little Life’ Review: A Collage of Unrelenting Torment
description: Hanya Yanagihara’s best-selling novel comes to the BAM stage, and raises the question: How much suffering can the protagonist (and the audience) endure?
dc:creator: Naveen Kumar
media:description: Maarten Heijmans, left, as Willem and Ramsey Nasr as Jude in Ivo van Hove’s production of “A Little Life” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
